description:
There`s a legend at Nijigaoka Academy that if you give someone a rainbow colored cupcake baked in the school`s oven on White Day, you`ll be friends forever. When Tsukasa learns about this, she decides to participatinig in the baking so she can be friends with Yuto forever. However, the cooking class becomes a slapstick class as she must hide her love of baking and girly character. Komugi and Kokona try to help, but... Will Tsukasa be able to make a legendary rainbow colored cupcake?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ツカサのミラクルホワイトデー
